name: Brain Master!
description:
Do you want to test your IQ level?
Blow your mind with Brain Master!
This is a unique puzzle game, which is different from other puzzle games.
Absolutely unimaginable riddles will make you addicted.
Brain Master: Tricky puzzles reveal your IQ, which can evaluate your logical thinking, memory, concentration and observation skills.
Breaking conventional thinking to find clues is the most exciting part of the game. This game will bring you a different gaming experience, creative thinking and unexpected solutions.
Accept the challenge of brainstorming. Let your imagination and observation go crazy!

Features
-Different brain test puzzles!
-Super brainwashing!
-Imaginative gameplay!
-Test your intelligence, imagination and logic ability.
-Simple and addictive game.

Method
-Find the difference quickly!
-Focus on details and clues!
-Find the solution to the puzzle!
-Use hints when you need them.
